answers.answer: Yea but you may want to know sooner rather then later cause you run the risk of having a big baby. I had gd for 8 weeks and my doc wouldnt call me back to tell me my test results till 32 weeks. Thankfully I was only a week and a half ahead. But going on the diet that late in the game has driven me crazy. Its rare though to to have gd. So its up to you. But I know at 24 weeks you get the first test if you fail that you go in before 28 weeks for your second test. If your high risk for it dont wait I would say.

question: So im in the middle of insurance switching and i missed my drs appt last week and they were going to do the glucose test... I have to make sure they take my new insurance before i go in cos i cant pay for it. They can still do the test later right??
title: gestational diabetes
